item.title: Analyzing /r/rupaulsdragrace
item.description: Updated: 06/11/17 Rupaul’s Drag Race is one of my favorite shows and one of the few spaces of LGBT representation present in today’s television. The website Reddit hosts many online communities dedicated to a myriad of topics, and the subreddit /r/rupaulsdragrace is one of the most vibrant forums dedicated to the show. As such, it is a perfect source of data to analyze popular reaction and production of information surrouding the show.

item.description: Questions? Comments? Queries? You can contact me on: Email - g.carranza@columbia.edu

item.title: Exploring Islamic Finance
item.description: Sharia law prohibits the imposition of interest on monetary loans. Charging interest is usually considered to be riba, or “usury”. The opposition to interest comes from an understanding of money only as a means of exchange and not as a commodity in itself. As Pakistani Islamic scholar Muhammad Taqi Usmani explains, “Since money has no intrinsic value…the exchange of a unit of money for another unit of the same denomination cannot be effected except as par value.
